pages.text: $(li)The Stick is a material that is used in multiple craft recipes.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:illagers/witch)Witches$(/l) may drop this item and they can be crafted placing Wood Planks, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bamboo)Bamboo$(/l) or Dullthorns in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
